about.title: About Us
about.heading: Who We Are
about.content: At ALOURA Creative House, we embrace a holistic approach that elevates your brand to new horizons. Founded by Lamia Al-Hassani in Saudi Arabia—the cradle of art and beauty—we craft bespoke solutions that redefine how brands connect with their audiences.
about.content2: We believe that details make the difference, which is why every brand we handle receives meticulous care. By blending aesthetics with inspiring storytelling in the worlds of fashion, beauty, and lifestyle, we create experiences that truly resonate.
about.content3: With more than seven years of expertise, we deliver an end-to-end journey—from strategy development to flawless execution—ensuring seamless harmony between your brand and its presence in the market.

founderSection.title: The Founder
founderSection.content1: Lamia Al-Hassani, founder of ALOURA Creative House, combines her passion for creativity with deep expertise in the fashion and beauty industry.
founderSection.content2: With a background spanning over seven years in the industry, Lamia established ALOURA to bridge brands with their audiences, focusing on authenticity and creativity.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about working with us

items.question: What services does ALOURA offer?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive creative services including Creative Direction, Content Creation & Development, and Social Media Management. Our expertise spans fashion, beauty, and lifestyle brands, delivering end-to-end solutions from strategy to execution.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A social media campaign typically takes 2-4 weeks, while comprehensive brand development may require 6-8 weeks. We always provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.

items.question: Do you work with brands outside Saudi Arabia?
items.answer: Yes! While we're based in Saudi Arabia and deeply understand the Gulf market, we work with brands across the MENA region and internationally. Our expertise in cross-cultural communication helps brands connect with diverse audiences.

items.question: What makes ALOURA different from other agencies?
items.answer: Our founder's 7+ years of hands-on experience in fashion and beauty, combined with our deep understanding of the Saudi market, sets us apart. We don't just create content—we craft experiences that resonate with your specific audience.

items.question: How do we start working together?
items.answer: Simply reach out through our contact form or email. We'll schedule a discovery call to understand your brand, goals, and vision. From there, we'll create a customized proposal tailored to your specific needs.

items.question: What industries do you specialize in?
items.answer: We specialize in fashion, beauty, lifestyle, and luxury brands. Our portfolio includes work with clothing brands, perfume houses, beauty salons, restaurants, and personal brands across various sectors.
